Projects

02

A mental health analyzer and providing doctor booking system.

Technology Stack- MERN stack and ML by using ANN algorithm.
Here I made up a portal where patient come and check is he affected from mental health or not by giving some answers and our model evaluate and we are also registering psychiatrist with there time slots where they can meet to patient and patient book the slots according to their time and patient can check there previous records and doctor also of his patients.

Automation of Khelo india scheme tender system

Technology Stack - MERN Stack and recommender System by ML .
It is a group project where I work on Reactjs to make frontend by using Material UI .
Automation of Khelo india scheme tender system by this we make Portal where govt. post a tender and admin from govt. side see all the proponents and also providing them a reccomender system to help inm decision making &n proponent can fill the tenders and see the status .
